typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Prop_0
	)) ~> movieDailyUpdate
source(output(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> movieOrig
movieDailyUpdate select(mapColumn(
		movie = Prop_0,
		title = Prop_1,
		genre = Prop_2,
		year = Prop_3,
		rating = Prop_4,
		rottom = Prop_5,
		action = Prop_6
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SetFields
SetFields derive(each(match(lower(name)=='movie'||lower(name)=='year'||lower(name)=='rating'||lower(name)=='rottom'), $$ = toInteger($$))) ~> Casting
Casting sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genre,
		year,
		rating,
		rottom
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		movie
	)) ~> moviesOutParquetFolder
